CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains about warm-up task to MOT and leaves room
MOT stands in the middle of room with CHI on her arm and then bends down and places CHI on floor next to toys . CHI looks around in room
<bef> MOT picks up toy duck . MOT squeezes duck
MOT holds duck out in front of CHI
MOT puts duck down on floor and sits down next to CHI
CHI follows duck with eyes . <aft> CHI turns head to her left and looks at toys
<bef> MOT picks up duck and moves it towards CHI . <aft> MOT squeezes duck
CHI pushes car back and forth and then turns it over on its side
<aft> CHI turns head around and looks in the direction of plastic bag leaning against desk
CHI straightens up and wiggles body
<aft> CHI leans forward and picks up duck then turns towards MOT
CHI puts duck in MOT's lap
MOT holds duck out in front of CHI and squeezes it
CHI turns torso to her left and looks at car
CHI reaches out for car and touches it then moves closer to football and reaches out for it
CHI looks at car then at football
<bef> CHI plays with ball . CHI straightens up and turns towards MOT
CHI turns head and looks at ball
<8-9> MOT places duck in front of CHI
CHI turns head and follows duck with eyes . <aft> CHI reaches for duck
<bef> CHI squeezes duck . CHI leans towards MOT
CHI puts both hands on floor and moves further back then reaches out for duck and pulls it towards herself
<5 .> MOT takes something out of CHI's hair
<bef> CHI picks up duck . CHI turns towards MOT . <aft> CHI lets duck fall into MOT's lap
duck slides down from MOT's lap and lands on floor
CHI turns around . <aft> CHI puts hand on car
<aft> CHI turns around and looks at MOT
CHI turns head and looks at car
CHI looks down in front of her
<$=1> CHI looks at and points to something to her left
object CHI points to cannot be seen on screen
CHI continues to point in the same direction but looks up at something
<bef> CHI turns head and looks into the camera . CHI continues to point in the same direction
CHI turns head and looks at MOT then at duck
CHI leans a little bit forwards towards duck
MOT places duck in front of CHI
MOT reaches out for car next to CHI
MOT places car in front of CHI
CHI reaches out for car and pushes it back and forth
CHI continues to push car back and forth
CHI leans forward towards duck and puts both hands on floor
CHI reaches out for duck then picks it up and straightens up
it sounds as if CHI is babbling
CHI turns towards MOT . <aft> CHI puts duck in MOT's lap
MOT looks down at duck then at CHI
CHI moves closer to ball . <aft> CHI reaches out for ball and picks it up then puts it down on floor and turns towards MOT
CHI pushes car back and forth and gives it a little push
car rolls a little behind CHI
MOT looks up to her right . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI turns head and looks at car
MOT straightens up and reaches out for book
MOT scratches her shoulder and leans back against chair
CHI looks up at MOT then down at duck
MOT reaches out for book . <aft> MOT picks up book
MOT places book next to CHI
<bef> CHI throws ball on page . <aft> CHI turns torso to face MOT and picks up toy duck
CHI looks at ball . <aft> CHI looks at duck
<bef> CHI holds duck out towards MOT . CHI pulls hand back and wiggles body . <aft> CHI turns torso towards book and leans forward towards book
CHI looks at duck then at book
MOT gets up halfway then picks up ball which is under the table and places it next to book
CHI watches MOT then looks at ball
CHI reaches out for ball and touches it . <aft> CHI pulls hand back and reaches out for car
CHI looks at ball . <aft> CHI looks at car
MOT picks up car . <aft> MOT places car in front of CHI and sits down in chair
CHI drops duck and reaches out for it
CHI plays with duck and picks it up . <aft> CHI holds duck up in front of her
CHI kicks out with legs . <aft> CHI leans back a little and puts one hand on floor for support
<aft> CHI turns head around and looks at wall behind her then at jack+in+the+box
CHI turns head and looks at wall behind her
MOT sits in chair behind CHI in partial view of camera
CHI looks in the direction of camera
<aft> CHI turns head and looks at wall where wastebasket is
<bef> CHI looks up at ceiling . CHI looks down at duck
CHI turns head and looks at jack+in+the+box
<$=3> CHI bangs hand on lid of jack+in+the+box
CHI turns head and looks at duck
CHI turns around towards MOT by moving feet
CHI holds duck out towards MOT
<bef> CHI looks up at duck . <aft> CHI looks in the direction of door
CHI looks down in her lap then at ball under table
CHI picks up ball and lets it fall down on book
CHI puts both hands down on floor
CHI leans forward towards ball then straightens up
MOT stretches arm out for ball and pushes it back to CHI
CHI leans forward and reaches out for ball
MOT picks up ball and holds it up in front of CHI
CHI looks up at MOT . <aft> CHI looks at ball
<aft> MOT places duck in front of CHI then grabs ball and places it next to CHI
CHI reaches out for duck then gives ball a push
CHI looks at duck then at ball
MOT gets up from chair . <aft> MOT reaches out for jack+in+the+box
MOT picks up jack+in+the+box which she places next to her and sits down
MOT moves a toy out of the way
CHI puts hand on top of jack+in+the+box
MOT pushes jack+in+the+box closer to CHI
CHI plays with top of jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI starts playing with crank and inclines head then straightens up
<bef> CHI glances at MOT . CHI looks at jack+in+the+box
CHI bangs hand on top of jack+in+the+box
<bef> CHI drops duck then picks it up and holds it out towards MOT
MOT holds hand out towards duck
MOT looks at duck then at CHI
CHI turns head and looks at jack+in+the+box
MOT holds duck up in front of CHI
<2> MOT places duck on top of jack+in+the+box still holding onto it
CHI reaches out for box and starts playing with it
CHI lifts jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI places jack+in+the+box in front of her and tries to turn crank
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI looks at crank
<bef> CHI pushes jack+in+the+box so it falls over . <aft> CHI leans forward toward duck and takes it
MOT picks up jack+in+the+box and places it next to CHI
INV explains about Small Scale Activity to MOT and puts out toys on table
MOT puts CHI in high chair at table and CHI starts to play with toys
INV leaves and MOT sits down on chair and fills out forms
INV explains about Forbidden Object task to MOT then puts away all toys except a slinky
MOT is sitting next to CHI on chair and INV is sitting across the table from them holding forbidden object
CHI plays with slinky and blinks eyes
INV lets go of little balls
CHI closes eyes and wrinkles up her nose . <aft> CHI holds hand up in front of face
MOT wipes CHI's eye with finger
CHI reaches hands out towards object
CHI pulls hands back and leaves them suspended in front of the object
CHI looks down at INV's hand
CHI turns torso around towards MOT and puts hand on MOT's arm
INV takes forbidden object off table
INV explains about PCI boxes to MOT then leaves room
MOT stands next to desk holding CHI with one arm and picks up a box with the other
MOT walks towards middle of room with box and is about to put box down on floor
MOT puts box back on desk
<bef> MOT walks towards middle of room . MOT holds ball up in front of MOT
MOT gives ball to CHI . <aft> MOT puts CHI down on floor
CHI holds ball with both hands
CHI does not want to sit down but prefers to stand up
CHI looks up at MOT while holding the ball
MOT kneels down in front of CHI
<bef> CHI turns head around to follow ball with eyes
MOT grabs CHI's hand and helps her sit down
CHI is now sitting down on floor with her left side to camera
<bef> MOT catches ball . MOT picks up ball and holds it out in front of her . <aft> MOT lets ball drop to the ground
ball bounces a couple of times and rolls to CHI
CHI leans forward putting one hand on floor and pushes ball with other hand
CHI looks under the table then up at MOT
<bef> MOT looks in the same direction as CHI . MOT looks at CHI
CHI puts other hand on floor
CHI looks up at MOT then in the same direction as before
CHI continues to crawl but changes direction and crawls towards desk with boxes
ball rolls towards CHI then makes a turn and stops next to wall
MOT points to ball with hand
CHI looks up towards PCI boxes
MOT looks at and points to ball then looks at CHI
CHI looks at and points to something in the direction of the boxes
MOT looks in the same direction as CHI
CHI looks at and points to something on wall with drawings
MOT turns around and looks in the same direction as CHI
MOT turns head around and looks at CHI
CHI looks and points in the direction of desk
CHI looks at and points to wall with wastebasket
CHI looks and points in the direction of desk
MOT looks at item then at CHI
dʌk dʌk dʌk dʌk dʌk dʌr
CHI looks around in room . <3 .> CHI looks at and points to something in the direction of MOT
<bef> MOT looks over her shoulder . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI looks in direction of MOT . <2> CHI points in direction of MOT . <aft> CHI follows ball with eyes
MOT leans forward and reaches out for ball
MOT straightens up and picks up ball
MOT is over at the desk and noises from putting lids on and taking lids off are heard
<aft> MOT crawls closer to CHI with towel in her hand
<bef> MOT sits down and unfolds towel . MOT holds towel up over her face
CHI looks in the direction of wastebasket then turns her head and looks in the direction of boxes
MOT holds towel out in front of CHI
MOT leans forward and reaches out for towel
MOT holds towel up in front of her face and leans closer towards CHI
MOT puts towel over CHI's head
CHI puts towel down to her left
CHI looks and points in the direction of wastebasket then in the direction of MOT
MOT looks at CHI and nods head yes once
CHI moves arms up and down
<bef> MOT holds towel up in front of her face . MOT leans forward towards CHI
CHI gets down on hands and knees and starts to crawl towards desk with boxes
<bef> MOT moves plastic bag from floor to chair
CHI looks up at plastic bag
CHI turns head so she faces camera
CHI moves arm backwards towards MOT . <aft> CHI turns torso around towards MOT
<aft> CHI looks in the direction of chair
MOT takes CHI's hand and grabs hold of towel
MOT gets up on her knees and crawls towards desk
CHI raises arm towards towel then lowers it to scratch one side of her head
MOT puts towel back in its box
<bef> CHI leans forward and grabs hold of chair . CHI gets up on her knees holding onto chair
MOT turns towards CHI holding crayons and paper in her hands
MOT puts paper on floor in front of CHI . <aft> MOT holds crayons out in front of CHI
MOT looks at CHI . <aft> MOT looks down at paper
CHI leans forward and starts to draw
CHI picks up paper and turns it around
CHI bangs tip of crayon on paper
CHI looks at paper then at MOT
MOT looks at CHI and nods head yes once
CHI sits next to MOT with her left side facing camera
CHI reaches out for crayon in front of her
MOT picks up crayon and gives it to CHI
MOT pulls paper closer to CHI
CHI throws crayon into MOT's lap
CHI looks at crayon then at paper
MOT picks up crayon then leans forward towards paper and puts hand on paper
all but one sheet slide out of CHI's hand
MOT looks at paper on floor
CHI looks at paper on floor then at paper in her hand . <aft> CHI looks at paper in her hand then at paper on floor
<aft> CHI puts paper in her hand on floor and turns towards the paper on floor and picks each sheet up and throws it up in the air
CHI looks up at MOT then at the paper she put on floor
<aft> CHI reaches out for paper in front of her
<bef> CHI places paper in her lap
CHI looks at crayon in her hand then turns head and looks in the direction of MOT's legs . <aft> CHI looks at paper
MOT draws on paper in CHI's lap . <aft> MOT offers crayon to CHI
<bef> CHI reaches out for crayon and takes it . CHI holds crayon up in front of MOT
MOT picks up crayon . <aft> MOT grabs hold of paper
<bef> CHI looks in the direction of table and chair
MOT leans forward and puts one arm on floor
MOT straightens up so she is sitting on her knees leaning forward towards CHI
MOT holds crayon out in front of CHI
CHI looks at crayon . <aft> CHI turns head to see where crayon landed
<aft> CHI reaches out for crayon and throws it
CHI turns head and looks at paper in front of her
CHI starts banging hand on paper . <aft> CHI picks up paper then straightens up and starts shaking paper back and forth
<bef> MOT watches CHI . MOT looks at paper
MOT tries to take paper from CHI but gives up and picks up a piece of paper next to her . <aft> MOT places paper on floor and begins to draw
MOT looks at paper in CHI's hand then at paper next to her
CHI pulls paper away from MOT and places it in her lap . <aft> CHI reaches out towards MOT's paper with hand holding crayon
CHI looks at paper then at crayon in her hand . <aft> CHI looks at MOT's paper
MOT turns paper in CHI's lap over
CHI looks at paper in her lap
MOT puts hand on her paper
CHI puts hand on MOT's hand
CHI pulls hand back and transfers crayon from one hand to the other
CHI tries to get hold of MOT's crayon
CHI picks up crayon and throws it . <aft> CHI straightens up
CHI looks at paper in her lap . <aft> CHI looks at paper next to her
<aft> CHI draws a line on paper then makes movement to pick up a piece of paper next to her
CHI puts tip of crayon on paper
MOT looks at CHI and nods head yes
CHI puts tip of crayon on paper
CHI looks down in front of her .
CHI picks up crayon . <aft> CHI puts crayon she has in other hand on paper then transfers other crayon to her free hand and throws crayon onto another piece of paper and then picks up both crayons
<bef> CHI looks at paper in front of her . CHI looks at paper to her left
CHI starts to bang tip of crayon on paper . <aft> CHI draws on paper
CHI looks in the direction of the wastebasket
MOT points to marks on CHI's drawing
MOT straightens up and turns towards a piece of paper in front of wastebasket . <aft> MOT picks up paper and offers it to CHI then puts it down
CHI looks and points in the direction of wastebasket . <aft> CHI points in the direction of electric plugs
CHI is not interested in paper
CHI looks at and points to something on wall in front of her . <aft> CHI looks at crayon in her hand
MOT looks down at CHI and nods head yes once
CHI reaches out for paper next to her . <aft> CHI picks up paper and starts to get up supporting herself on MOT's knee
CHI looks in the direction of door and chair
CHI looks in direction of chair
CHI looks down in MOT's lap then to the right of MOT's lap
MOT pushes CHI back to a standing positon with hand
CHI moves arms up and down and shakes knees
<aft> CHI looks in the direction of table
CHI looks in direction of desk
CHI plays with paper and chair then moves closer to MOT and grabs hold of her blouse
CHI reaches hand with crayon out towards wastebasket

MOT holds onto CHI and it looks like she is pushing CHI down to a sitting position . CHI apparently does not want to sit down and walks backwards . This happens once again . CHI is now standing in front of MOT with MOT's arm around her
CHI looks at and points to little chair . <aft> CHI looks at MOT
<aft> CHI turns around towards MOT and starts waving paper right in front of MOT
CHI continues to wave the paper then turns around to her right . <aft> CHI drops crayon and paper on floor
MOT looks down while holding on to CHIs waist
CHI picks up crayon . <aft> CHI sits down but tips over
MOT crawls towards desk on her knees
MOT picks up papers on floor and puts them in box
CHI watches MOT then looks at floor in front of her and then at crayon
CHI puts crayon in mouth and then takes it out and puts it back in
MOT bends down to pick something up
CHI takes crayon out of mouth
CHI shakes body once as if excited
CHI gets down on hands and knees and starts to crawl in the direction of the small chair
MOT looks at cover of book
CHI lets crayon in her hand fall to the ground
MOT shows book to CHI with one hand and picks up crayon with the other
MOT puts crayon in box and reaches out for lid . <aft> MOT takes lid and puts it on box with both hands
CHI watches MOT then looks at cover . <aft> CHI watches MOT then looks down at book
CHI turns cover with both hands . <aft> CHI takes book with both hands then drops it and opens it
<bef> MOT bends over book . MOT turns book around
MOT looks and points to item
<bef> CHI looks up and points to something on wall
<aft> CHI waves finger she is pointing with
<bef> MOT looks at CHI . MOT turns head to see what CHI points to
MOT turns head around to the other side and looks at items
CHI looks up in the direction of wastebasket . <aft> CHI looks at MOT
CHI lifts bottom from floor and then sits down again
MOT looks at and points to item
CHI inclines head and puts a finger on page
CHI looks at and points to picture on opposite page
<bef> MOT looks at and points to item on page
MOT looks at and points to item on page
MOT looks at and points to item
CHI turns back to the previous page
MOT looks at and points to item
<3-5> MOT points to page . MOT looks at page

<bef> CHI picks up book and holds it in front of her . <aft> CHI puts book down on floor and crawls towards a toy under table where she sits down and picks up toy and then moves a little further to her right and sits down
<bef> CHI looks to her left . <aft> CHI first looks at book then around under table and then at toy and finally at MOT
CHI looks at toy then up at MOT
CHI looks like she is pretending to brush her hair with toy
<aft> MOT looks from toy to book a couple of times
CHI puts hand on page . <aft> CHI closes book then picks it up and shakes it
CHI looks at opposite page . <aft> CHI looks at book then at toy and then at book
MOT reaches out with hand to help CHI with book . <aft> MOT takes book and places it on floor
MOT looks at CHI . <aft> MOT looks up at INV
